Html:
Hi,

I am trying to have a stream from my webcam on VR player. But, there is something weird with my webcam. In VLC player, it opens with a very low fps when I try defaults, but when I change video input frame rate from advanced options it looks fine. Maybe it's something related to vlc player, because it looks fine with other players also. I don't know, I am not an advanced vlc user :/

So, I was wondering if there is an option to change default fps for stream in VR player? Or any other possible solution/suggestion (with VLC/webcam) maybe?

Thanks!

I copied the options line from vlc also but still it is not as smooth as vlc. Here is what I wrote in the URL line:

dshow:// :dshow-fps=30 :live-caching=300
